function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research on office workplace pandemic control","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective workplace modifications","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive research on office workplace pandemic control","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Office workers, management, visitors","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate workplace modification activities at the operational level","Impact":"Risk of inadequate protection against COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive workplace modification plans and guidelines","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Office workers, management, visitors","Owner":"Organizations, workplace professionals"},{"Description":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk control","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in preventing COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Integrate engineering controls and environmental modifications into workplace strategies","Technologies":"Air ventilation systems, physical barriers, UV-C disinfection","People":"Office workers, management, visitors","Owner":"Organizations, building maintenance professionals"}]}
